metadata.Title: CVE-2018-15870 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: An invalid memory address dereference was discovered in decompileGETVARIABLE in libming 0.4.8 before 2018-03-12. The vulnerability causes a segmentation fault and application crash, which leads to denial of service.

criterions.comment: ming: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
